title: Dying Light 2 Delayed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.20.20
description:
Install Raid for Free ✅http://patron.me/KindaFunnyGamesRaid and get a special starter pack 💥Available only in the next 30 days.


Get 20% off and free shipping by using the code GAMES at http://manscaped.com.

Catch the games Saturdays at 2pm Pacific, Sundays at Noon Pacific and Monday night league at 5:30pm Pacific on http://Watch./LoLEsports.com  and  http://TWITCH.tv/LCS  and http://YouTube.com/LoLEsports



Danny Thompson from Nintendo Enthusiast joins Greg to talk about Dying Light 2's delay, 2D Metroid rumors, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:06:48 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:08:14 - Dying Light 2 Delayed
00:13:40 - “Do you think this helps Google Stadia?” - Shaun Eye
00:15:32 - Rumor: 2D Metroid and a traditional Paper Mario to release in 2020
00:26:12 - Ubisoft Lawsuit over DDOS Attacks
00:32:04 - Monster Hunter World: Iceborne Roadmap
00:38:19 - Out today
00:45:30 -  Manscaped
00:46:40 - RIOT
00:48:03 - RAID  
 Reader mail   -
00:49:30 - “I'm curious about your thoughts on what Biden said about video game developers” - anakinjmt
00:52:02 - “How is covering for a more specific fanbase in the industry different than covering the industry at large?” - 2038 Pokémon CEO
00:54:34 - “With rumors flying around left and right about what we will happen next gen which rumor is your favorite and which do you think will actually come to fruition?” - Frankfurtter
00:57:38 - Squad Up: Mark - Xbox - Cedrixs
00:59:40 - Required Reading: https://bit.ly/2RfdCcJ 
01:01:39 - You‘re Wrong
01:04:09 - Post Show
This Week’s Hosts:
Tuesday: Blessing & Imran
Wednesday: Greg & Whitta
Thursday: Greg & Blessing
Friday: Blessing & Tim

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!

Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
